message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $150 if possible. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $140?
I understand your budget constraint, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I'm close to your target price, Bob! I can offer you an exclusive deal. I'll meet you at $155. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
